topic.title: 전화로 저녁 식사 예약하기
topic.description: 전화로 레스토랑에 저녁 식사를 예약하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 오늘 저녁 식사 예약을 하고 싶습니다.
네, 몇 분이신가요 그리고 몇 시를 원하세요?
두 명이고, 저녁 7시쯤으로 예약할 수 있을까요?
잠시만요, 확인해 보겠습니다. 네, 7시에 예약 가능합니다.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'd like to make a dinner reservation for this evening.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'd like to make a dinner reservation | for this evening.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course, for how many people and for what time?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course, | for how many people | and for what time?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: For two people, can I make a reservation for around 7 PM?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: For two people, | can I make a reservation for | around 7 PM?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: One moment, let me check. Yes, a table for 7 PM is available.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: One moment, || let me check. || Yes, | a table for 7 PM is available.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: To make the reservation, could I have your name and phone number?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: To make the reservation, | could I have your name | and phone number?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, the name is Minjun Kim, and the phone number is 010-1234-5678.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | the name is Minjun Kim, | and the phone number is 010-1234-5678.
